channel.title: Blocking Cheat Engine to be started with The client
channel.description:
so, i have ma own server. and ppl are using cheat engine to dupe items.. does anyone knows a good fix for this or knows how i make something so the client doesnt run if cheat engine is started.. its quite easy to do it in Visual Basic.. but then the players always need to start a .exe in background... so maybe someone can help me??
BTW sorry for ma bad english !llol
